item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Top US officials shared classified details of military strikes with journalist
2. Retail traders plough $67bn into US stocks while investment giants flee
3. ‘Remarkable sloppiness’: Trump officials’ chat breach shakes Washington
4. [Opinion] British Airways tries to regain its halo with a new first-class seat
5. Trump to hit countries that buy Venezuelan oil with 25% tariff
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
